Result: Pro-Barrow forces victory Adama Barrow is sworn-in as President in the Gambian embassy in Dakar, Senegal.[13] United Nations Security Council Resolution 2337 is passed. Senegal, Nigeria, and Ghana invade the Gambia in support of Barrow.[7] Jammeh steps down and leaves Gambia
